title: Named Parameter JDBC Template

lessons.title: Adding Spring and DataSource Configuration
lessons.description: We'll now add the Spring framework to our JDBC project. We'll add dependency injection to our Main and DAO class. We'll also learn how to configure DataSource as a Spring bean and supply connection parameters to it in the XML file.

lessons.title: Using JdbcTemplate
lessons.description: We'll use the JdbcTemplate class provided by Spring to implement a DAO method. We'll see how using the template class makes the DAO methods simple, and how it takes care of much of the boilerplate code we'd have to write otherwise.

lessons.title: Returning Other Datatypes from JdbcTemplate
lessons.description: We returned an integer datatype result from our query in the previous tutorial. In this tutorial, we'll learn how to return other datatypes. We'll implement a method that returns a String query output.

lessons.title: Implementing RowMapper
lessons.description: In this tutorial, we implement a custom RowMapper class to map our domain objects. We then use this class to write fetch methods that return custom model objects.

lessons.title: Performing Write Operations with JdbcTemplate
lessons.description: We'll now implement some database write operations. We'll write a DAO method to update a value in the database, as well as use the execute() method to run a DDL SQL query.

lessons.title: Named Parameter JDBC Template
lessons.description: We'll use the NamedParameterJdbcTemplate class to run queries with named placeholders.

lessons.title: DAO Support Classes
lessons.description: We'll wrap up discussion on the Spring JDBC support by using the DAO support classes that Spring provides out of the box. We'll see how this makes our DAO classes cleaner than ever.

lessons.title: Using Hibernate with Spring
lessons.description: In this video, we'll learn how to integrate the Hibernate framework in our Spring application. We'll create a SessionFactory as a Spring singleton and use that in our DAO class to work with the database.
